<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 23"
    pfs=""
>
[Redsand Hourglass](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1815)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Blood Lords</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage](/Sources.aspx?ID=189) pg. 78

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This platinum hourglass is filled with red sand, is decorated with imagery of roses and whippoorwills with tiny black onyx eyes, and has the ability to manipulate time. Once used by [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=14) herself, the _Redsand Hourglass_ was stolen from Pharasma's court a millennia ago. While the hourglass is in your possession, you're immune to the [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35), and [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) conditions.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> Interact ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76), [transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** You fail a saving throw;  **Effect** You flip the hourglass upside down then immediately right it again, rewinding time by a few moments. Reroll the saving throw with a +4 circumstance bonus. You must use the results of this new saving throw.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> Interact ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You flip the hourglass upside down, unhinging you from the flow of time. You become [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) for 1 minute. You can use this extra action only to Step, Stride, or Sustain a Spell.

**Activate** <actions string="Three Actions" /> Interact ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) **Frequency** once per week;   **Effect** You flip the hourglass sideways, pausing time for everyone but yourself. You cast [_time stop_](/Spells.aspx?ID=339).

**Destruction** The _Redsand Hourglass_ is destroyed if it's used within the [Dimension of Time](/Planes.aspx?ID=21).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Redsand Hourglass
